{/* Imagen principal */}
{/* Información */}

Exhibition

Corner Gallery & Studio, Carabanchel

Digital Protest Art Collection

This exhibition is part of Artivism Digital Wall, featuring the most iconic protests transformed into unique digital artworks. Located in the vibrant neighborhood of Carabanchel, Madrid, Corner Gallery & Studio provides the perfect space for showcasing digital activism and protest art.

Our work explores the aesthetic and conceptual possibilities of digital art, treating code as if it were paint, and protest as the highest form of artistic expression.

Address

Corner Gallery & Studio, Carabanchel, Madrid

Exhibition Period

Ongoing - Digital Collection

{/* Botón EXPLORE */}
); }; export default Exhibition;
